snippet: The Norwegian Refugee Council said that by the start of this year more than 33 million people were displaced within their countries due to conflict.
lead_paragraph: The Norwegian Refugee Council said that by the start of this year more than 33 million people were displaced within their countries due to conflict.

headline.main: Number of People Displaced by Violence Highest in 20 Years, Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Number of People Displaced by Violence Highest in 20 Years, Agency Says
